p: Because cases have occurred in only 15 countries, with 55% of cases occurring in Egypt and Indonesia combined, inherent power limitations made quantitative assessment of climate type effects unfeasible. We instead present graphical representations as a preliminary analysis tool. We also manually synthesized the data we had compiled on HPAI H5N1 case occurrence with monthly weather data to visually assess the relationship between disease occurrence and local temperature, humidity, and season.
